instructions: Put the dinner plate on the bottom side of the tablecloth, slightly left of the center.
Put the dinner fork to the left of the dinner plate, with its tines facing upward.
Put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork, with its tines facing upward.
Put the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate, blade upward and facing the dinner plate.
Put the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife, its blade upward and facing left.
Put the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife, with its bowl upward.
Put the water glass to the right of the dinner plate and above the salad knife.
Put the wine glass to the right of the water glass.
Put the second wine glass to the right of the water glass.
Put the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon, with its handle facing right.
Put the bread plate above the dinner fork.
Put the butter knife on top of the bread plate on the top right corner
Put the dessert fork above the dinner place, with the tines facing right.
Put the dessert spoon above the dessert fork, with the bowl facing left.
Put the napkin on top of the dinner plate, with the leaf part facing upwards.
